#define lld long long int
#define g getchar_unlocked
#define p putchar_unlocked
#include<cstdio>
lld gt(){lld res=0,ch = g();while(ch<'0'||ch>'9')ch = g();while(ch>='0'&&ch<='9'){res = res*10+ch-'0';ch = g();}return res;}
void pt(lld n){char op[41];int size = 40;while(n){op[size--]=n%10+'0';n/=10;}for(int i=size+1;i<41;i++)p(op[i]);p('\n');}
int main()
{
	int t;
	lld N,M,K;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		N = gt();K = gt();M = gt();
		if(K==(lld)1){pt(N);continue;}
		while((N%K==0)&&M){M--;N/=K;}
		M&1?pt(N*K):pt(N);
	}
}
